about_the_game:
*In order to use the cards included in the DLC, purchase of the “Additional Card Pass Vol.2" or “Additional Card Set Vol.7 [D-BT10]: Dragon Masquerade” will be required.
*It is not available to use or check cards included in this DLC unless you purchase “Additional Card Pass Vol.2" or “Additional Card Set Vol.7 [D-BT10]: Dragon Masquerade”.
*Even if you purchasied this DLC first, included cards can be unlocked by purchasing “Additional Card Pass Vol.2" or “Rare Card Set 15 [D-BT10]: Dragon Masquerade”.

This set includes 1 copy of each card in FFR or FR treatment.
[INCLUDED]
D-BT10/FFR01EN Scarlet Flame Marshal Dragon, Gandeeva
D-BT10/FFR02EN Great Flame Axe of Ambitious Scales, Colgaflan
D-BT10/FFR03EN Mirror Reflection Equip, Mirrors Vairina
D-BT10/FFR04EN Karmic Demonic Jewel Dragon, Drajeweled Masques
D-BT10/FFR05EN Xeno Almajestar, Astroea=Bico Masques
D-BT10/FFR06EN Black Sky Thunder Quaking Queen, Leimina
D-BT10/FFR07EN Aurora Battle Princess, Penetrate Aquas
D-BT10/FFR08EN Sickle Blade of Inquest, Habitable Zone
D-BT10/FFR09EN Blue Deathster, Hanada Halfway
D-BT10/FFR10EN Great Sage of Heavenly Law, Solrairon
D-BT10/FFR11EN Hexaorb Sorceress, "Aquamarine"

D-BT10/FFR13EN Teasing Spiritualist, Zorga Masques
D-BT10/FFR14EN Servitude of Funeral Procession, Lianorn Masques
D-BT10/FFR15EN Love-binding Maiden, Margaret

D-BT10/FR15EN Desire Devil, Guutaran

D-BT10/FR17EN Solide Sturmer
D-BT10/FR19EN Aurora Battle Princess, Grenade Marieda
D-BT10/FR20EN Dissolving Heat Monster, Radiabilio
D-BT10/FR18EN Cardinal Principle, Lorfield
D-BT10/FR21EN Thunderous Fist Dragon, Gyeirom Dragon
D-BT10/FR22EN Blue Deathster, Req Gewehnr

This set includes 1 copy of each card in FFR or FR treatment.
